title: DeepMind Created An AI Tool That Can Help Generate Rough Film and Stage Scr
excerpt: Alphabet's DeepMind has built an AI tool that can help generate rough film and stage scripts Engadget's Kris Holt reports:  Dramatron is a so-called "co-writing" tool that can generate character descriptions, plot points, location descriptions and dialogue.
